mapper.select: SELECT r.*, d.* FROM reserve r JOIN dog d ON r.dogNo = d.dogNo WHERE r.bNo = #{bNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET attitude = #{attitude}, rCondition = #{rCondition}, tangle = #{tangle}, disliked = #{disliked}, bath = #{bath}, message = #{message}, curruntWeight = #{curruntWeight} WHERE rsNo = #{rsNo};
